distance_function module

Module for calculating distances between two points on Earth.

distance_function.haversine_distance(lat1: int | float, lon1: int | float, lat2: int | float, lon2: int | float) → float

Calculate the Haversine distance between two sets of latitude and longitude coordinates

Parameters:

  • lat1 (float) – Latitude of the first point

  • lon1 (float) – Longitude of the first point

  • lat2 (float) – Latitude of the second point

  • lon2 (float) – Longitude of the second point

Returns:

Haversine distance in kilometers

Return type:

float
